author: Dean Nicolls
title: How COVID-19 is shaping digital transformation
description: It’s essential that enterprises build in the necessary operational resilience to survive this new reality.
content: COVID-19 is already massively altering humanity and our global economy. There is no doubt that this pandemic will have widespread and long-lasting implications. As cases are recorded globally, and recent reports showing that nearly a quarter of the worlds pop… [+4811 chars]
